newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-CHIEVO COACH MALESANI TO JOIN FIORENTINA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-CHIEVO COACH MALESANI TO JOIN FIORENTINA.

text.p: Alberto Malesani will coach Italian first division Fiorentina next season after an impressive run with serie B side Chievo Verona.
Fiorentina said Malesani would take over as coach on a one-year contract after meetings between the Florence side and Chievo, a suburb of the northern town of Verona.
Sources said he would also bring two members of Chievo's training staff with him once the serie B season ends on June 15.
Malesani has never before coached a serie A team. He joined Chievo's youth team and then in 1993-94 took over the main team, securing promotion to serie B.
He replaces Claudio Ranieri who left Fiorentina last week after a disappointing season despite reaching the quarter-finals of the European Cup Winners' Cup.
Fiorentina won the Italian Cup last year but this season finished ninth in the league, out of European competition.
